manifest:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:versionCode="10000" android:versionName="0.0.1-SNAPSHOT" package="com.wuman.oauth.samples" platformBuildVersionCode="17" platformBuildVersionName="4.2.2-1425461">
	<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="9" android:targetSdkVersion="17" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" />
	<application android:label="Android OAuth Client Samples" android:icon="res/drawable-mdpi-v4/ic_launcher.png" android:allowBackup="false" android:hardwareAccelerated="true">
		<activity android:label="Android OAuth Client Samples" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.SamplesActivity" android:launchMode="singleInstance">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Instagram (OAuth 2.0 Implicit)" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.instagram.InstagramActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.EXAMPLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Twitter (OAuth 1.0a)" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.twitter.TwitterActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.EXAMPLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Flickr (OAuth 1.0a)" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.flickr.FlickrActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.EXAMPLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="GitHub (OAuth 2.0 Explicit)" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.github.GitHubActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.EXAMPLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Plurk (OAuth 1.0a)" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.plurk.PlurkActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.EXAMPLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Simple OAuth 2.0 Explicit (LinkedIn)" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.linkedin.SimpleOAuth2ExplicitActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.EXAMPLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Simple OAuth 1.0a (LinkedIn)" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.linkedin.SimpleOAuth10aActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.EXAMPLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Simple OAuth 2.0 Implicit (foursquare)" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.foursquare.SimpleOAuth2ImplicitActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.EXAMPLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Simple OAuth 2.0 Explicit (foursquare)" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.foursquare.SimpleOAuth2ExplicitActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.EXAMPLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Strava (OAuth 2.0 Explicit)" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.strava.StravaActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.EXAMPLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Customized UI" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.CustomizedProgressActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.EXAMPLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Dialog" android:name="com.wuman.oauth.samples.ui.HtmlLicensesActivity" android:excludeFromRecents="true" />
	</application>
</manifest>
